TY d`|`da.DUTY_TIME`, `da.TLC`, `da.DATE_`,
`d.TLC`, `d.BEGIN_DATE`, `d.END_DATE`|when `da.TLC` = `d.TLC` and `da.DATE_` >= `d.BEGIN_DATE` and `da.DATE_` <= `d.END_DATE`
then sum(`da.DUTY_TIME`)| |totalRestTime| | |N/A in the source system.| |numberOfDuties| | |The field is set to "1" in the query.| |numberOfActivities|`XCREW.MLOG$_DUTY d`,
`XCREW.CHAIN_DAILY c`, `xcrew.CHAIN_ITEM_DAILY cid`,
`xcrew.ITEM_DAILY id`|`d.CHAIN_DAILY_UNO`, `c.uno`, `cid.CHAIN_DAILY_UNO`,
`cid.ITEM_DAILY_UNO`, `id.UNO`, `id.TIME_STAMP`|when `d.CHAIN_DAILY_UNO` = `c.uno` and `c.uno` = `cid.CHAIN_DAILY_UNO` and `cid.ITEM_DAILY_UNO` = `id.UNO`
then count(`id.TIME_STAMP`)| |numberOfLandings|`XCREW.MLOG$_DUTY d`,
`XCREW.CHAIN_DAILY c`, `xcrew.CHAIN_ITEM_DAILY cid`,
`xcrew.ITEM_DAILY id`|`d.CHAIN_DAILY_UNO`, `c.uno`, `cid.CHAIN_DAILY_UNO`,
`cid.ITEM_DAILY_UNO`, `id.UNO`, `id.TIME_STAMP`|when `d.CHAIN_DAILY_UNO` = `c.uno` and `c.uno` = `cid.CHAIN_DAILY_UNO` and `cid.ITEM_DAILY_UNO` = `id.UNO` and `id.TYPE` = "L"
then count(`id.TIME_STAMP`)| # Crew Duties Data Model ### Data Retrieval #### - Data Retrieval Scope * :paperclip: Duty MLOG Data Retrieval #### - Source Query * :paperclip: Duty MLOG Data Retrieval, `Riverx_Duty_Statistic_Query`, `Riverx_Duty_Training_Date_Query` #### - Data Retrieval Trigger & Steps **Trigger:** :paperclip: Duty MLOG Data Retrieval **Steps:** * Following the execution of :paperclip: Duty MLOG Data Retrieval * When `status`(see Mapping for details) = “ACTIVE” then execute `Riverx_Duty_Statistic_Query` and `Riverx_Duty_Training_Date_Query` queries consecutively. #### - Data Handling Operation * Crew Duties data is sorted based on `XCREW.MLOG$_DUTY.SEQUENCE$$` field to ensure that it is the same as the processing order in the source system. * `rosterId` is retrieved from Crew Roster using `XCREW.MLOG$_DUTY.BEGIN_DATE` field. #### - Change Data Capture Operation * Unique Key: A composite key, combining `XCREW.MLOG$_DUTY.TLC`, `XCREW.MLOG$_DUTY
